courses.title: Close Protection (Level 3)
courses.description: Train for professional Close Protection roles with instructors who bring real-world military and UHNW security experience. Practical, scenario-based training for modern security operations.

courses.title: SIA Door Supervisor
courses.description: Gain your SIA Door Supervisor licence and start working across nightlife, events, retail, and corporate security roles with strong earning potential.

courses.title: Conflict Management
courses.description: Learn professional techniques to prevent, de-escalate, and manage conflict safely in high-risk and public-facing environments.

courses.title: Physical Intervention
courses.description: Safe, legal, and professional physical intervention training designed to protect staff, clients, and organisations when conflict escalates.

courses.title: Emergency Care First Aid (Level 3)
courses.description: Comprehensive first aid training for medium to high-risk workplaces, delivered through practical, scenario-based instruction.
